title: The souls return to its God, in life, and at death A funeral sermon, preached upon occasion of the death of Mr. John Kent, late of Crouched Friars, who departed this life Decem. 16. 1689. By Samuel Slater, minister of the Gospel.
author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.
publisher: printed for John Dunton at the Black Raven in the Poultry,
notes: Copy cropped at head, slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
